author: fwyzard
body:
Build alpaka device code for the CUDA and ROCm back-ends in "GPU only" mode. In this mode, functions marked as ALPAKA_FN_ACC are marked as `__device__` functions, and are compiled only for the corresponding GPU device back-ends.

Currently, functions marked as ALPAKA_FN_ACC are marked as `__host__ __device__` functions, and may be compiled for both device and host back-ends. The latter leads to linker errors in kernels that use device symbols like `threadIdx`, `blockIdx`, _etc_. that are compiled for the ROCm back-end.

Backport #9121 to CMSSW 14.0.x for data taking.
title: Build alpaka code in GPU-only mode [14.0.x]
